MAIN_MESSAGE: It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown for safety at  5:29PM in the CW12 postcode area of Congleton, following reports of trees on the overhead lines. This may affect the supply to your property. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 9:00PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 5:32PM on 16th March 2021.
